title: I lost LP due to update screw up

embed.description: Post with 2 views. File Screw Up

body: So the update that I just got screwed up and didn't run the game. To explain further I could enter the lolclient window and join a que and ban/select my champ. But the client didn't connect me to the game, Instead I had to try and figure out why. I've left Images and small descriptions of what I did to fix the issue. I still have no idea if it was riot, me/my computer that made this screw up.
